themes: overrepresentation of white men in grant awards
perceived low quality of funded art
lack of support for talented underrepresented artists
key_phrases: Men have had WAY MORE than their share
sickened by the amount of mediocre white men that I see getting thousands of dollars from the city grants
talented artists who apply and don’t get chosen
It makes us divest and literally move away from the city
the city doesn’t care about us
most of the art is just not that deep
barriers_identified: bias in grant awarding towards white men
lack of opportunities for female and underrepresented artists
perceived disregard for artistic quality in funding decisions
artists leaving the city due to lack of support
